languages.text: {n}Инцендия торжествующе сверкает глазами, обличающе указывая на Соломона.{/n} "Я долго отказывалась верить, что Теодора прикормила Адептус Арбитес, чтобы они закрывали глаза на ее проступки, но теперь вижу — ересь поразила служителей Лекс Империалис. А значит, всякий суд от имени Его теперь лишь мой долг".

{n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия торжествующе сверкает глазами, обличающе указывая на Соломона.{/n} "Я долго отказывалась верить, что Теодора прикормила Адептус Арбитес, чтобы они закрывали глаза на ее проступки, но теперь вижу — ересь поразила служителей Лекс Империалис. А значит, всякий суд от имени Его теперь лишь мой долг".

Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

{n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

languages.text: {n}Incendias Augen funkeln triumphierend, als sie anklagend auf Solomorne zeigt.{/n} "Ich habe mich lange geweigert, zu glauben, dass Theodora das Adeptus Arbites bestochen hat, um ihre Verbrechen zu vertuschen, aber jetzt sehe ich, dass Ketzerei die Diener des Lex Imperia befallen hat. Was bedeutet, dass jedes Urteil in Seinem Namen nun allein mir obliegt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendias Augen funkeln triumphierend, als sie anklagend auf Solomorne zeigt.{/n} "Ich habe mich lange geweigert, zu glauben, dass Theodora das Adeptus Arbites bestochen hat, um ihre Verbrechen zu vertuschen, aber jetzt sehe ich, dass Ketzerei die Diener des Lex Imperia befallen hat. Was bedeutet, dass jedes Urteil in Seinem Namen nun allein mir obliegt!"

languages.text: {n}Incendia pointe Solomorne d'un doigt accusateur, une lueur triomphante dans le regard.{/n} « J'ai longtemps refusé de croire que Théodora avait soudoyé l'Adeptus Arbites pour qu'il ferme les yeux sur ses délits, mais force est de constater que les serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis ont succombé à la corruption de l'hérésie. Cela signifie que je suis désormais la seule à pouvoir rendre des jugements au nom de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia pointe Solomorne d'un doigt accusateur, une lueur triomphante dans le regard.{/n} « J'ai longtemps refusé de croire que Théodora avait soudoyé l'Adeptus Arbites pour qu'il ferme les yeux sur ses délits, mais force est de constater que les serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis ont succombé à la corruption de l'hérésie. Cela signifie que je suis désormais la seule à pouvoir rendre des jugements au nom de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの目が勝ち誇ったように輝いた。彼女はソロモーンを指さして非難した。{/n}「シオドーラが自分の悪事を見逃してもらうために高等裁定局を買収したなんてこと、私は長いこと、信じたくなかった。でも今は、異端がレックス・インペリアの奉仕者たちをも堕落させたのだと分かった。つまり、今や陛下の御名において裁きを下す責務は、この私ひとりに託されたということだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの目が勝ち誇ったように輝いた。彼女はソロモーンを指さして非難した。{/n}「シオドーラが自分の悪事を見逃してもらうために高等裁定局を買収したなんてこと、私は長いこと、信じたくなかった。でも今は、異端がレックス・インペリアの奉仕者たちをも堕落させたのだと分かった。つまり、今や陛下の御名において裁きを下す責務は、この私ひとりに託されたということだ」

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Incendia brillan, triunfales, y señala acusadora a Solomorne.{/n} «Durante mucho tiempo me había negado a creer que Theodora pudiera haber sobornado al Adeptus Arbites para que pasara por alto sus crímenes, pero ya veo que la herejía ha corrompido incluso a los representantes de la Lex Imperialis. Lo que significa que ahora soy la única capacitada para repartir justicia en Su nombre».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Incendia brillan, triunfales, y señala acusadora a Solomorne.{/n} «Durante mucho tiempo me había negado a creer que Theodora pudiera haber sobornado al Adeptus Arbites para que pasara por alto sus crímenes, pero ya veo que la herejía ha corrompido incluso a los representantes de la Lex Imperialis. Lo que significa que ahora soy la única capacitada para repartir justicia en Su nombre».

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅责难地瞪着索罗蒙，双眼中闪烁着胜利的光芒。{/n}“我以前一直不肯相信西奥多拉贿赂了帝国法务部，让那些法务官对她的恶行睁一只眼闭一只眼。可现在，我亲眼见到了异端邪说是如何腐化帝国律法的仆从的。也就是说，此时此刻，只有我有权以神皇的名义进行审判。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅责难地瞪着索罗蒙，双眼中闪烁着胜利的光芒。{/n}“我以前一直不肯相信西奥多拉贿赂了帝国法务部，让那些法务官对她的恶行睁一只眼闭一只眼。可现在，我亲眼见到了异端邪说是如何腐化帝国律法的仆从的。也就是说，此时此刻，只有我有权以神皇的名义进行审判。”

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın gözleri, Solomorne'u suçlayıcı bir şekilde işaret edip âdeta zaferle parlıyor.{/n} "Theodora'nın yaptığı kötülükleri görmezden gelmeleri için Adeptus Arbites'e rüşvet verdiğine inanmayı uzun süre reddettim. Şimdiyse kâfirliğin, Lex İmperialis'in hizmetkârlarını yozlaştırdığını görüyorum. Bu da O'nun adına yargılamada bulunmanın vazifem olduğu anlamına gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's eyes gleam in triumph as she points at Solomorne accusingly.{/n} "I long refused to believe that Theodora had bribed the Adeptus Arbites to turn a blind eye to her misdeeds, but now I see that heresy has corrupted the servants of the Lex Imperialis. Which means that all judgement in His name is now my duty alone."
